snippet: One increasingly popular niche for those who want to be their own boss are jobs that target people who want to stay in their own homes, rather than move to an assisted living facility.
abstract: Retiring column notes that services catering to elderly are creating increasingly popular niche for retirement-aged Americans who want to be their own boss; holds that as population ages, jobs like massage therapist and others like senior fitness trainers, dietitians and nutritionists, personal assistants, handymen, drivers and caterers who prepare meals for shut-ins are on the upswing.
lead_paragraph: One increasingly popular niche for those who want to be their own boss are jobs that target people who want to stay in their own homes, rather than move to an assisted living facility.

headline.main: An Aging Population Also Poses Opportunities for Retirement Careers
headline.print_headline: An Aging Population Also Poses Opportunities for Retirement Careers
